name: !discord
description: Displays a link to my Discord server

name: !love
description: Show the target viewer some love!

name: !hug
description: Give the target viewer a hug!

name: !quote
description: Display a random quote || display a quote by its number

name: !heist
description: Start/join a heist to get points!

name: !give
description: Give points to the target viewer

name: !points
description: Display how many points you have

name: !top
description: Display the top viewers based on points

name: !tophours
description: Display the top viewers based on hours watched

name: !8ball
description: Ask the 8ball a question and receive a non-commital answer

name: !slots
description: Try your luck at the slots for more points!

name: !duel
description: Request to duel another viewer for points

name: !accept
description: Accept a duel challenge from another viewer

name: !deny
description: Deny a duel challenge form another viewer

name: !cancel
description: Cancel a duel you have initiated

name: !death
description: Display current number of deaths on the death counter
